title: Guided Independence
subtitle: My Teaching Philosophy
introduction: True musical growth happens when you develop the confidence to explore and express yourself authentically. My 'Guided Independence' approach provides you with solid foundations while nurturing your unique musical voice.

principles.title: Foundation First
principles.description: We start with essential techniques and theory, building the groundwork you need for confident improvisation.

principles.title: Personal Expression
principles.description: Once you have the basics, we focus on developing your individual style and musical personality.
